data.title: Scarface World is Yours Long Sleeve T
data.meta_description: How to Dress explosive? Try Wearing this Scarface World is Yours Long Sleeve Men’s T-Shirt by American Classics, Available in all sizes up to 6XL.
data.text:
Description

Scarface Men’s Long Sleeve T-Shirt by American Classics

THE definition of cult classic, the 1983 version of Scarface saw Al Pacino‘s iconic role as Tony Montana the Cuban refugee in 80’s Miami. This movie inspired a generation, the rags to riches story in the crime-ridden underbelly of the drug world in Miami is critically acclaimed and hugely popular still to this day – still a very quoted movie 40 years on! As Pacino became a hollywood heavyweight, Scarface got cooler as it got older, spawning rap songs, comic books, graphic t-shirts and another remake. This 80’s inspired Scarface World is Yours Long Sleeve t-shirt is vintage style as if you got it from Tony Montana himself, mang. So… say goodnight to the bad guy.

What’s included:

Black printed long sleeve t-shirt

Available in all standard sizes (S, M, L, XL, 2XL)

Officially licensed apparel

Made of quality 100% cotton

Full-color vintage style print to the chest

Double needle sleeve and bottom hem

Rolled forward shoulders for better fit

Pre-washed to minimize shrinkage

Regular fit

Crew neck

Full length sleeves

Back is blank

About American Classics

American Classics are classic American! AC produces quality 100% licensed t-shirts and apparel since 1994. Sold in global stores and includes a wide variety of licensed tees from classic movies and TV shows to Musicians and American Icons. Officially Licensed Merchandise You are buying from an official manufacturer of merchandise. American Classics only sells great quality cotton t-shirts with long lasting digital graphics.

Men’s Size Guide

Please use the size guide carefully to prevent returns. Brand sizes are designed to fit to the following body measurements.

Small – Length = 27″ (69 cm) – Chest Width = 18″ (46 cm)

Medium – Length = 28″ (71 cm) – Chest Width = 20″ (51 cm)

Large – Length = 29″ (74 cm) – Chest Width = 22″ (56 cm)

XL – Length = 30″ (76 cm) – Chest Width = 24″ (61 cm)

2XL – Length = 31″ (79 cm) – Chest Width = 26″ (66 cm)

Returns Info
